pci_databases_namespaces_edit_type_popov: There can only be one non-aggregated namespace
pci_databases_namespaces_edit_retention_: The data retention duration for the namespace in short time format. Examples: 20s, 10m, 24h, 1d
pci_databases_namespaces_edit_resolution: The resolution for an aggregated namespace.
pci_databases_namespaces_edit_writes_com: Defines whether M3DB should include writes to this namespace in the commitlog.
pci_databases_namespaces_edit_snaphot_en: Defines whether M3DB should create snapshot files for this namespace.
pci_databases_namespaces_edit_blocksize_: The amount of time a block is held in memory before it is written to disk, in short time format. Examples: 20s, 10m, 24h, 1d
pci_databases_namespaces_edit_buffer_pas: A past duration for which writes are still accepted on the name space, in short time format. Examples: 20s, 10m, 24h, 1d
pci_databases_namespaces_edit_buffer_fut: A future duration for which writes on the namespace are already accepted, in short time format. Examples: 20s, 10m, 24h, 1d
pci_databases_namespaces_edit_error_mess: An error has occurred modifying the {{name}} namespace. Please try again later.
